title: raghunandhana raaja mOhana
sahitya:
raghunandana rAjamOhana ramiyimpavE nA manasuna

anupallavi

 nagajAnilaja nAradAdi hrNNAlikani vAsuDaina gAni shrI

caraNam

 cittamandu ninnunci prEmatO cinticu sadbhaktula nuttamOtta mulancu nA 
madinunci pUjinca lEdA tattaramu dIrcu kAraNambu nIvE tALa jAla nika tyAgarAjanuta
